public.ir_module_module.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM ir_module_module WHERE license = 'OEEL-1' OR name IN ('web_enterprise', 'web_studio', 'helpdesk', 'documents', 'planning', 'approvals', 'sign', 'voip', 'iot', 'quality_control', 'industry_fsm', 'social_marketing', 'sale_subscription')
public.ir_module_module.notes: DELETE all EE module records or set state='uninstalled'

public.ir_config_parameter.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM ir_config_parameter WHERE key ILIKE '%enterprise%' OR key ILIKE '%studio%' OR key = 'web.base.url.freeze' OR key ILIKE 'database.enterprise_code'

public.ir_ui_view.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM ir_ui_view WHERE arch_db::text ILIKE '%web_enterprise%' OR arch_db::text ILIKE '%web_studio%' OR arch_db::text ILIKE '%studio_approval%' OR arch_db::text ILIKE '%widget="web_ribbon"%' OR key ILIKE '%.studio_%'
public.ir_ui_view.notes: DELETE views with EE widgets or Studio customizations

public.ir_asset.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM ir_asset WHERE path ILIKE '%/web_enterprise/%' OR path ILIKE '%/web_studio/%' OR path ILIKE '%/theme_%_enterprise/%' OR path ILIKE '%enterprise.%'

public.ir_attachment.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM ir_attachment WHERE res_model IN ('helpdesk.ticket', 'documents.document', 'sign.request', 'planning.slot', 'approvals.approval') OR url ILIKE '%/web_enterprise/%'
public.ir_attachment.notes: DELETE attachments linked to EE-only models (data loss)

public.ir_model_data.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM ir_model_data WHERE module IN ('web_enterprise', 'web_studio', 'helpdesk', 'documents', 'planning', 'approvals', 'sign', 'voip', 'iot', 'quality_control', 'industry_fsm', 'social_marketing', 'sale_subscription')
public.ir_model_data.notes: DELETE all external IDs belonging to EE modules

public.ir_cron.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM ir_cron WHERE model_id IN (SELECT id FROM ir_model WHERE model ILIKE '%helpdesk%' OR model ILIKE '%planning%' OR model ILIKE '%documents%' OR model ILIKE '%sign%' OR model ILIKE '%approvals%') OR code ILIKE '%env[%helpdesk%' OR code ILIKE '%env[%planning%'
public.ir_cron.notes: DELETE cron jobs referencing EE models

public.mail_template.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM mail_template WHERE model IN ('helpdesk.ticket', 'documents.document', 'planning.slot', 'approvals.approval', 'sign.request') OR body_html::text ILIKE '%helpdesk%' OR body_html::text ILIKE '%planning%'
public.mail_template.notes: DELETE email templates for EE models

public.res_users.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT u.id, u.login, STRING_AGG(g.name, ', ') as ee_groups FROM res_users u JOIN res_groups_users_rel r ON u.id = r.uid JOIN res_groups g ON r.gid = g.id WHERE g.name ILIKE '%helpdesk%' OR g.name ILIKE '%planning%' OR g.name ILIKE '%documents%' OR g.name ILIKE '%studio%' OR g.name ILIKE '%approvals%' OR g.name ILIKE '%sign%' OR g.name ILIKE '%quality%' OR g.category_id IN (SELECT id FROM ir_module_category WHERE name ILIKE '%enterprise%') GROUP BY u.id, u.login
public.res_users.notes: MODIFY: Remove EE group memberships from res_groups_users_rel, keep user records

public.res_config_settings.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM res_config_settings WHERE module_web_enterprise = true OR module_web_studio = true OR module_helpdesk = true OR module_documents = true OR module_planning = true OR group_studio_user_id IS NOT NULL
public.res_config_settings.notes: MODIFY: Set all module_* EE flags to false

public.res_company.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM res_company WHERE font IN ('Lato', 'Roboto', 'Montserrat', 'Oswald', 'Raleway') OR external_report_layout_id IN (SELECT id FROM ir_ui_view WHERE key ILIKE '%enterprise%')
public.res_company.notes: MODIFY: Reset font to CE-compatible option, null external_report_layout_id if EE

public.website.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT w.* FROM website w WHERE theme_id IN (SELECT id FROM ir_module_module WHERE name ILIKE 'theme_%_enterprise' OR name IN ('theme_odoo_experts', 'theme_loftspace', 'theme_graphene')) OR w.id IN (SELECT res_id FROM ir_model_data WHERE model = 'website' AND module IN ('website_studio', 'web_studio'))
public.website.notes: MODIFY: Switch theme_id to CE-compatible theme (theme_default)

public.ir_act_server.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM ir_act_server WHERE model_id IN (SELECT id FROM ir_model WHERE model IN ('helpdesk.ticket', 'documents.document', 'planning.slot', 'approvals.approval', 'sign.request')) OR code ILIKE '%helpdesk%' OR code ILIKE '%documents%' OR code ILIKE '%planning%' OR code ILIKE '%studio%'
public.ir_act_server.notes: DELETE automated actions for EE models

public.ir_ui_menu.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT m.* FROM ir_ui_menu m JOIN ir_model_data d ON d.res_id = m.id AND d.model = 'ir.ui.menu' WHERE d.module IN ('web_enterprise', 'web_studio', 'helpdesk', 'documents', 'planning', 'approvals', 'sign', 'voip', 'iot', 'quality_control', 'industry_fsm', 'sale_subscription')
public.ir_ui_menu.notes: DELETE menu items for EE modules

public.helpdesk_team.notes: ENTIRE TABLE INCOMPATIBLE - Export to JSON, DO NOT migrate

public.documents_document.notes: ENTIRE TABLE INCOMPATIBLE - Export to JSON, DO NOT migrate

public.planning_slot.notes: ENTIRE TABLE INCOMPATIBLE - Export to JSON, DO NOT migrate

public.delivery_carrier.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM delivery_carrier WHERE delivery_type IN ('bpost', 'easypost', 'fedex', 'ups', 'usps', 'dhl')
public.delivery_carrier.notes: EXAMINE: EE-only carriers must be removed or switched to 'fixed' type

public.pos_config.incompatibility_detection_method: SELECT * FROM pos_config WHERE iface_tipproduct = true OR module_pos_restaurant = true OR iface_printer_id IS NOT NULL
public.pos_config.notes: MODIFY: Disable IoT/Restaurant features (set flags to false, null printer references)
